text: Shifty Adventures in Nookie Wood is the fifteenth studio album by multi- instrumentalist John Cale. It was released in October 2012. It was his first full-length album on Double Six Records label. == Track listing == == Personnel == * John Cale − vocals, keyboards, piano, organ, synthesizer, electric guitar, acoustic guitar, electric viola, bass guitar, percusions, programming * Dustin Boyer − guitars, synthesizer, background vocals * Michael Jerome Moore − drums, percusions, cajón * Joey Maramba − bass guitar * Danger Mouse − bass guitar, synthesizer and programming on "I Wanna Talk 2 U" * Erik Sanko − bass guitar on "Scotland Yard" * Eden Cale − background vocals on "Hemingway" Category:John Cale albums Category:2012 albums
title: Shifty Adventures in Nookie Wood
